abstract.para: Apart from local clusters and metro area clusters, SUSEÂ® Linux Enterprise High Availability Extension 15 SP2 also supports geographically dispersed clusters (Geo clusters, sometimes also called multi-site clusters). That means you can have multiple, geographically dispersed sites with a local cluster each. Failover between these clusters is coordinated by a higher level entity, the so-called booth.
